text: goal libminer provide overview R library setup. toy package created part workshop meant serious use.

title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: can install development version libminer GitHub :

title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages library locations, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary() function:
code: library(libminer) lib_summary() ##                                                                                                             Library ## 1                      /private/var/folders/9t/gsrg0j4n7532tzbczy_49d_h0000gp/T/RtmpNXqntB/temp_libpathde634e8ad5b3 ## 2 /Users/emiljohansson/Library/Caches/org.R-project.R/R/renv/library/libminer-ceb45e55/R-4.3/aarch64-apple-darwin20 ## 3          /Users/emiljohansson/Library/Caches/org.R-project.R/R/renv/sandbox/R-4.3/aarch64-apple-darwin20/ac5c2659 ##   n_packages ## 1          1 ## 2         98 ## 3         29 # specify `sizes = TRUE` to calculate the total size on disk of your packages lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) ##                                                                                                             Library ## 1                      /private/var/folders/9t/gsrg0j4n7532tzbczy_49d_h0000gp/T/RtmpNXqntB/temp_libpathde634e8ad5b3 ## 2 /Users/emiljohansson/Library/Caches/org.R-project.R/R/renv/library/libminer-ceb45e55/R-4.3/aarch64-apple-darwin20 ## 3          /Users/emiljohansson/Library/Caches/org.R-project.R/R/renv/sandbox/R-4.3/aarch64-apple-darwin20/ac5c2659 ##   n_packages  lib_size ## 1          1     15159 ## 2         98 161383021 ## 3         29      1630

what: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary

title: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary
Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary
text: sizes sizes libraries calculated? Logical; default `FALSE`.

title: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's   libraries. `lib_size` column included `sizes = TRUE`.

title: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                                                                                             Library #> 1 /home/runner/.cache/R/renv/library/libminer-46f6a755/linux-ubuntu-jammy/R-4.4/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu #> 2          /home/runner/.cache/R/renv/sandbox/linux-ubuntu-jammy/R-4.4/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/3df92652 #>   n_packages #> 1         65 #> 2         29 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                             Library #> 1 /home/runner/.cache/R/renv/library/libminer-46f6a755/linux-ubuntu-jammy/R-4.4/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu #> 2          /home/runner/.cache/R/renv/sandbox/linux-ubuntu-jammy/R-4.4/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/3df92652 #>   n_packages lib_size #> 1         65 68187540 #> 2         29      963
